attributes.action: bring in compulsary measures for all motorbikes to have their headlights on at all times; to prevent accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics show that motorcyclists are at the highest risk of death, on Britain's roads. They also show that the main reason behind this is that drivers of other vehicles fail to see the motorbike, as a result of their narrow profile. By having the headlights on at all times, they will significantly increase their chances of being seen in the rear-view mirror.
